body.p:
HeadQuarters 13th U. S. Infantry
Newport Barracks Ky.
June 7th 1864.
Sir
I have the honor to transmit herewith a consolidated Tri-Monthly report of men enlisted into the 13th Infantry (Regular Army) from the State of Kentucky from the 21st to the 31st day of May 1864.

I am Sir,
Very Respectfully,
Your Obedient Servant.
Ferd. E. de Courcey
1st Lieut & Adjt 13th Infty
Actg Supt Regtl Rectg Service

To His Excellency
The Governor of the State of Kentucky
Frankfort. Ky.

13
Newport Barracks Ky
June 7. 1864
De Courcy C.
Lt 13th U. S. Inft
Has the honor to transmit Tri-monthly report of Recruits enlisted into Regular Army from 21st to 31st of May 1864

L. B. No 4 -- 1864 P. 301
Recd A. G. O. June 20 1864
